question:
Which among the following deposits and their size is/are correctly matched?
  1. Gravel - 2mm to 256mm
  2. Mud - 1mm  to 1/16mm
  3. Sand - Finer than 1/8192mm
Select the correct code from the options given below:
explanation:
Various deposits and their size (Diameter)
Gravel: 2mm- 256mm
Sand: 1mm – 1/16mm
Silt: 1/32mm – 1/256mm
Clay: 1/256mm – 1/8192mm
Mud: Finer than 1/8192mm
